org.openstreetmap.josm.plugins.mapillary.downloads

Class MapillaryDownloader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openstreetmap.josm.plugins.mapillary.downloads.MapillaryDownloader

  • public class MapillaryDownloader
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that concentrates all the ways of downloading of the plugin. All the download petitions will be managed one by one.

    • Method Detail

      • getImages

        public static void getImages(org.openstreetmap.josm.data.coor.LatLon minLatLon,
                             org.openstreetmap.josm.data.coor.LatLon maxLatLon)
        Gets all the images in a square. It downloads all the images of all the sequences that pass through the given rectangle.
        Parameters:
        minLatLon - The minimum latitude and longitude of the rectangle.
        maxLatLon - The maximum latitude and longitude of the rectangle

      • completeView

        public static void completeView()
        If some part of the current view has not been downloaded, it is downloaded.

      • getImages

        public static void getImages(org.openstreetmap.josm.data.Bounds bounds)
        Gets the images within the given bounds.
        Parameters:
        bounds -

      • automaticDownload

        public static void automaticDownload()
        Downloads all images of the area covered by the OSM data. This is only just for automatic download.

      • getMode

        public static int getMode()
        Returns the current download mode.
        Returns:
        0 - automatic; 1 - semiautomatic; 2 - manual.

      • stopAll

        public static void stopAll()
        Stops all running threads.
